titleStmt.title: SII 8.17: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 17. (A.R. No. 431 of 1902). ON THE SAME WALL.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
ḷa svasti śrī . pūmevu vaḷar tiruppoṉmātu puṇara nāmevu kalaimakaḷ nalam peritu ciṟappa vicaiyamā tiruppa Icaiyincelviyu meṇṭicai viḷaṅka nirupar vantiraiñca niṇilamaṭantaiyai tirumaṇa
m puṇarntuc cirvaḷar taruma maṇimuṭi kavitteṉa Aṇimuṭi cūṭi mallala ñālattup palluyirik kellā mellaiyi veṇkuṭainiḻaṟ ceṅko locci vāḻiūḻi yāḻinaṭappac cempon virasiṁhāsanattup pu
vaṉimuḻutuṭaiyāḷoṭum viṟṟiruntaruḷiya kovirājakesaripaṉmarāna tiripuvanaccakkaravarttikaḷ śrīkulottuṅkacoḻadevarkku yāṇṭu jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu cempūrkoṭṭattu puṟaiyūṟnāṭṭuc ceyyūrāṉa
jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻanallūrp puṟṟiṭaṅkoṇṭaruḷiya mahādevarkku Iv ceriarayaṉāṉa rāja taraiyaṉ cantirātittavarai celvatāka vaitta tirunantāviḷakku
Oṉṟukku viṭṭa pacu muppatum Ikkoyili liddevarp paḷḷiyarainācciyāṟkup palicaiyāṟ tiruvāparaṇan tiruppaṇikaḷuk kuṭalāyc celvatāka mutal kuṭutta kācu Irupatum Ikkoyilc civa
brāhmaṇan tiṇṭikkūttaṉuñ cūriyaṉ tāṅkuvāṉum Ippacu muppatum Ikkācu Irupatuṅ kaikkoṇṭu cantirātittavarai Ippacuvāṟ tirunantāviḷakku Oṉṟum celutti Ikkācu muta laḻiyāte vai ttu Ikkāci lāṇ
ṭutoṟum peṟṟa palicaiyāluḷḷatu Ikkoyilil śrīmāheśvarakkaṇkāṇi tiruppaṇi ṟku celuttakkaṭavomākavum . Intap paḷḷiyaṟainācciyāṟku
meṟpaṭiyān vai tta tirunantāviḷakku Oṉṟukku Ivartanta kācu muppatu Ikkācu palicaiyāl Ittirunantāviḷakku Oṉṟum can=ti rātittavarai celu
Ivan tampi coḻamaturāntakatevan Ittevaṟku vaitta santiviḷakku Oṉṟukku viṭṭa Āṭu paṉniraṇṭum nāṅkaḷ kaikkoṇṭu santiviḷak koṉṟu
cantirātittavarai celuttakkaṭavomākavum . meṟpaṭiyān Intap paḷḷi yaṟainācciyāṟkut tiruppaṭimāṟṟuk kuṭalāka Iṟai yiḻitti viṭṭa nilam Ivvūril Amutavallivaticeṟu
viṟ teṟkaṭaiyak kuḻi nūṟṟirupatu Ikkuḻi . nūṟṟirupatuṅ kaikkoṇṭu ḷḷatu Innācciyāṟkut tiruppaṇimāṟṟu celuttakkaṭavomākavum . Ippacu muppatuṅ kācu Aimpatum Innilamum Āṭu
paṉniraṇṭum kaikkoṇṭu kal veṭṭuvittom Ikkoyiliṟ civabrahmaṇan tiṇṭikūttaṉāṉa puṟṟiṭaṅkoṇṭamahādevapaṭṭanum cūriyan tāṅkuvānbhaṭṭaṉum Ivviruvom . Itu paṉmāheśvara rakṣaiḥ ....
Digital edition of SII 8.17 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
